result.execSummary:
The defendant Blake C. LUTZOW was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.203(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge.

timeConds.notes: imposed and stayed, to be imposed upon the agent's discretion.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Blake C. LUTZOW
Current: 921 S. 19th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 02-05-2016)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.   Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.    
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.   Not guilty pleas.   Jury Calendar.   Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 04-08-16 at 9:00 a.m.   
Court modifies defenant's bail to $500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, he must maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs and he must submit DNA sample.   Bail furnished.   
Minutes.
Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant in custody.
Attorney Pangburn was just appointed and just met his client today.  He requests a brief adjournment.
Preliminary hearing is reset to 02-05-16 at 3:00 p.m.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 02-01-16 at 10:00 a.m.
Minutes.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of battery or threat to law enforcement officer, disorderly conduct, resist officer and bail jumping.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 01-25-16 at 2:30 p.m. Bail is set at $100.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, provide a DNA sample, and maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.   Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued. Copy filed.
Minutes.
